data.name: FALL IN LOVE3
data.detailed_description:
Casual gameplay

"FALL IN LOVE3" has a very classic gameplay, you need to find all the differences in the 2 pictures to pass the level! The game operation is also very simple, just use the mouse to click on the different parts of the picture, no need
Too difficult to operate, very suitable for weekend leisure time to play.

Colorful illustrations

The illustrations used in the game levels are all beautiful girls and they all have their own unique style. The main goal of the game is to collect all the pictures of beautiful girls through all the levels. You need to carefully observe them with the naked eye to pass the level faster. Some of the differences are on their breasts or more hidden places.

Produced by "Origin team", it must be a fine product.

data.short_description: "FALL IN LOVE3" is a beautiful girl finding the difference game, you need to use your sharp eyes to find the difference between 2 anime pictures!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window 7
  • Processor: i3 2600
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 260
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This configuration is the minimum requirement, anything higher than this configuration can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: window 10/11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 590
  • Storage: 240 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The illustrations used in the game contain sexual content, mainly in scantily clad women (exposed breasts, genitals) and overt sexuality
